When you entered the next room, it is empty, nothing around you in that room. 

Suddenly the door behind you closes, and the floor beneath you opens away to a bottomless pit. 

You started to fall, and you do not even know when to land, or what will happen to you.

This is an adventure game where you explore a dungeon that randomly changing structures. 

Your objective is to get a treasure chest that guarded by the dungeon. 

There is also 3 available endings.

Pick one of four decision or options given in order to advance to the next room or corridor, and eventually get the treasure. \n\nHowever, some options can change the outcome of the endings. for example, bad decisions can increase your chances of getting a bad ending.
